content:
How do I find the following content that comes with my purchase?
[list]  	
[*]Digital Artwork  	
[*]Soundtracks  	
[*]Digital Deluxe Content  	
[*]Other/Misc Content  [/list]
All [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6948-51E6-E624-8A84]Downloadable Content (DLC)[/url] access should automatically be added to the product. Please contact the product's support for assistance with DLC content.

[h1]In most cases, bonus content can be found within the products's downloaded files:[/h1]
To access this content please do the following...
[olist]  	
[*]Right click the product in your Steam Library and select "Properties".  	[*]Under the "Local Files" tab, select "Browse...".  	
[*]Within the product's local files, locate a folder that has a similar name to the content you are searching for.  
[/olist]
Please note, the folder containing the bonus material may have a different title, but should be identifiable as the location for this content. All Soundtracks should be in MP3 format, while Art Books should be a PDF or ePub.


[h1]Where can I find Soundtracks within Steam?[/h1]
Some soundtracks are automatically integrated into the Steam Music Player after the associated product has been completely installed. Please visit our [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/4DBA-E6A9-1115-7852]Steam Music Library and Player[/url] FAQ for more info. Soundtracks that are not automatically added can be found using the instructions above.
title: How do I find bonus content, artwork and soundtracks?
